resources.string: This button starts the discovery of a device. It will fail with a timeout
You should see no dialog and the search will fail after 20 seconds
Predictive back animations only supported for gesture navigation
Android 16 supports predictive back animations for 3 button navigation

Android 16 improved the bond loss handling to the system. If a previously bonded Bluetooth device could not be authenticated upon reconnection, the system will disconnect the link and retain local bond information
After the bond loss is detected, system would automatically remove the bond and initiate a new pairing process, which could lead to unintentional re-pairing
In order to connect to a device, you need to start a Bluetooth server on it. Please do that by pressing the button below

Android 16 changed the way bond loss is handled. Install this app on two devices, pair them and establish the connection. Afterwards, unpair the remote device and check logs in order to see the difference Android 16 brought!
